name: WorkFlowy 2,3,4,5,6-columns!
description: Note that the default workflowy layout is very narrow, so if you're using more than 2 columns, you're probably going to want this style, which lets workflowy expand to the whole width of the browser window: https://userstyles.org/styles/132659/workflowy-total-minimalist IMPORTANT: Install the greasemonkey/tampermonkey script here or this won't work. Also the 5 and 6 ones aren't very practical at all, but I included them because I figured I might as well. See examples here: https://workflowy.com/s/Z6Pqzz8tOU
